title: Regarding branch change
content: So, I am current in Sem 2 doing ECE in EC Campus, with Sem 1 GPA of 8.5. How much do I need to score in Sem 2 minimum to be able to shift to AIML at EC Campus at least?

comments.body: With a cgpa of 8 you should get it. Just try to keep it as high as possible though
Cse at EC campus needs just 7.5-7.75, so aiml will be even lesser
You should realistically be able to get AIML or maybe even cse in ec campus with that gpa. The cse(ec campus) cut off was something along the lines of 8 for my batch.
